label: Quote-to-Order Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates entire quote lifecycle from inquiry through order conversion, integrating CRM, CPQ, ERP, inventory, pricing, and credit systems.
capabilities: Orchestrate end-to-end quote process
Balance speed, accuracy, margin optimization, and customer satisfaction
Coordinate RFQ intake, configuration, pricing, approval, and conversion
Monitor quote aging and recommend proactive actions
Track conversion metrics and identify optimization opportunities

label: Contract Lifecycle Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates contract creation, negotiation, execution, monitoring, and renewal while balancing speed, risk management, compliance, and revenue protection.
capabilities: Orchestrate end-to-end contract lifecycle
Balance speed with risk management and compliance
Coordinate contract generation, negotiation, and execution
Monitor contract performance and compliance
Trigger proactive renewal workflows

label: B2B Catalog Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates catalog generation, personalization, distribution, and punchout integration while balancing real-time freshness, performance, and scalability.
capabilities: Orchestrate real-time catalog generation and distribution
Balance freshness, performance, and personalization
Coordinate punchout integration with customer procurement systems
Manage multi-channel catalog syndication
Optimize catalog content and structure

label: Multi-User Buying Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates requisition, approval routing, budget checking, and order placement while balancing approval thoroughness vs speed and compliance vs user experience.
capabilities: Orchestrate multi-user buying and approval workflows
Balance approval thoroughness with speed
Coordinate budget validation and policy enforcement
Manage delegation and escalation scenarios
Optimize approval policies based on performance data
dataSources: User roles, departments, and manager hierarchy

label: Credit & Payment Terms Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates credit evaluation, limit assignment, monitoring, and collections while balancing sales enablement with risk management.
capabilities: Orchestrate end-to-end credit and payment terms lifecycle
Balance sales enablement (approve quickly) vs risk management
Coordinate credit scoring, limit setting, and collections
Monitor portfolio-level risk exposure
Optimize credit policies based on performance data
